頼みというのは

事なんじゃ。
ギルスがあの洞窟に

話はお前も聞いたな。齔
帰ってきたばかりの
お前には酷だが
この町で、魔物達と
戦えるのは
お前だけなんじゃよ。
水が濁った事と
関係あるかも
しれんしな。
この町を救うためだ
と思って行ってくれ。齔
［おお、そうじゃ。
フィリップス王子
への手紙］と、少ないが
これで旅の準備を
整えてくれ。
洞窟の入口は
開けておこう。
装備を整えてから
行くようにな。
Nassel? Welcome back! I'm sure everyone:
Nassel, you came at
a good time.
The fact is, I need
a favor from you.
And the favor I'm
talking about
concerns Gilys. As
you've also heard,
he's been trapped
inside that cave.\
It's unfair to you,
so soon after your
return, but you are
the only one in this
town who can fight
the monsters.\
It's possible that
they relate to the
corruption of the
water. Think of it
as saving the town!\
Oh, of course. Take
this [letter to
Prince Phi]lips, and
provision yourself
for the journey with
this small sum.
I'll have the cave
opened. Gather some
equipment before you
leave!
